reviews.review_msg: Amazing prof! I think I am gonna miss the days learning criminology with Karen! She not only teaches the knowledge but helps her students figure out a way comprehending from their own perspective. She always inspires me to work hard for my CRIM career. And her class is funny and interesting, I never get tired because of the "Karen style" examples!

She's an amazing prof. I mean ya which you will have to put in time and effort but well, if u aren't in university to do that, then what are u there for? Amazing teacher, kind, accessible. Your efforts won't go in vain for sure.
